# Celestial Cartography: Mapping God's Faithfulness
## Scripture
"The Lord said to Abram, 'Leave your country, your people and your fatherâ€™s household and go to the land I will show you. I will make you into a great nation, and I will bless you; I will make your name great, and you will be a blessing.'" - Genesis 12:1-2

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky, we can see the constellations, like old friends, guiding us through the vast expanse of God's creation. Just as ancient cartographers mapped the stars to navigate the seas, God mapped out a plan for Abraham, promising to make him a great nation and a blessing to all. This promise, like the constellations, remains constant, a reminder of God's faithfulness. As we journey through life, we can look to the stars and remember that God's promises are just as enduring.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, thank you for the celestial map that guides us through the ups and downs of life. Help us to remember your promise to Abraham and to trust in your faithfulness. Just as the constellations remain constant, may our faith remain unwavering, guiding us to be a blessing to those around us. May we look to the stars and be reminded of your infinite love and care for us. Amen.
